question_text: A company runs its production workload on Amazon EC2 instances with Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volumes. A solutions architect needs to analyze the current EBS volume cost and to recommend optimizations. The recommendations need to include estimated monthly saving opportunities. Which solution will meet these requirements?

options.A: Use Amazon Inspector reporting to generate EBS volume recommendations for optimization.
options.B: Use AWS Systems Manager reporting to determine EBS volume recommendations for optimization.
options.C: Use Amazon CloudWatch metrics reporting to determine EBS volume recommendations for optimization.
options.D: Use AWS Compute Optimizer to generate EBS volume recommendations for optimization.
